name: Bok Askol
Lore: 'At birth, a Pacithhips gene configuration usually indicates if they''re to become a farmer, an intellectual, or a warrior. Bok Askol''s destiny remained a mystery for years.',
Text: 'Once during your deploy phase, may draw destiny: (0-2) no result; (3-4) Askol draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise for remainder of turn; (5+) Askol is power +4 for remainder of turn.',
